name: I have an idea
description:
Brief Bitsy game for class.

Manifesto: So with this project I wanted to create a visual/interactive representation of what it's like be hit with an idea, but be surrounded by whatever may be distracting at the time. Thought this would be good to practice surreal imagery in a limited engine. I'm actually happy with Bitsy, because once you know the limits you realize what ideas can and can't be done, assuming you aren't using hacks. It means I won't have to deal with unexpected coding trouble. May use it in the future if I want to make something brief.
